title: Courts of Prythian
description: Explore the seven courts of the Fae realm!

questions.question: How many courts are there in Prythian?
questions.explanation: There are seven courts: Night, Day, Dawn, Spring, Summer, Autumn, and Winter.

questions.question: What is the hidden city of the Night Court called?
questions.explanation: Velaris is the City of Starlight, a hidden jewel of the Night Court that Rhysand protects from the world.

questions.question: The Court of Nightmares is another name for the Night Court.
questions.explanation: The Court of Nightmares (Hewn City) is a separate, darker part of the Night Court that Rhysand rules but despises.

questions.question: Which court does Helion rule?
questions.explanation: Helion is the charismatic High Lord of the Day Court, known for his libraries and magical knowledge.

questions.question: What season is the Spring Court associated with?
questions.explanation: The Spring Court represents renewal and growth, with lands of eternal spring beauty.

questions.question: Who is the cruel High Lord of the Autumn Court?
questions.explanation: Beron Vanserra is the ruthless High Lord of the Autumn Court and Lucien's father.

questions.question: The Summer Court is ruled by High Lord Tarquin.
questions.explanation: Tarquin is the young High Lord of the Summer Court, one of the youngest High Lords in history.

questions.question: What are the Illyrians in the Night Court known for?
questions.explanation: Illyrians are fierce winged warriors known for their brutal training and aerial combat skills.
